name: Kaka Zhang
description: Hi, I am Kaka Zhang, a junior at Basis Independent Silicon Valley. I qualified for AMC 10 distinguished honor roll, tiebreaked at Caltech Math Meet, and placed no.8 in Berkeley Math Tournament general round. I love competitive math and math circles, and I believe that there is a more intuitive way to learn math that is applicable to the real world, and I am dedicated to bringing an enjoyable math experience to everyone.

name: Yifan Hu
description: I'm a junior at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley who really finds joy in mathematics. I've qualified for the AIME, and right now, I'm studying linear algebra. Aside from math, I’m interested in physics and coding. In my free time, I enjoy playing video games or playing badminton.

name: Madeline Hu
description: Hi, I'm Maddie Hu, a freshman at Los Altos High School. I enjoy learning calculus, discrete math, and proofs, and am excited to help others excel in their mathematical journey.

name: Nicholas Wang
description: I'm Nicholas Wang, a freshman at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley who enjoys coding and math. My favorite field in math would be Number Theory. I've done various math competitions such as the AMCs, AIME, BMT, etc. Aside from math, I like to experiment with APIs, work on coding projects, and participate in hackathons. In addition to just casual coding, I compete in algorithmic programming competitions such as USACO and ACSL. In addition to this, I also play both the Piano and the Cello.

name: Aaron Cohen
description:
Hello, my name is Aaron Cohen. I am a freshman at Basis Independent Silicon Valley. I am currently taking six AP courses and two Honors courses, including AP Calculus BC, Physics, and Economics. I have been on the Distinguished Honor Roll for every trimester since fifth grade at Basis. I am an avid reader and have read thousands of fiction and nonfiction books. I also enjoy cycling, archery, and swimming. I believe that math is best learned by focus on mastering fundamentals with incremental progress.

​

name: Carolina Sun
description: Hi, my name is Carolina Sun, and I go to BISV and I'm in 9th grade. I enjoy math, teaching, drawing, playing chess, and so many more. I can't wait to learn with you guys!

name: Leo Zeng
description: Hi, my name is Leo Zeng, and I'm a freshman at Basis Independent Silicon Valley. Math is my favorite subjects, and I've developed a passion for math since kindergarten. In terms of competitive math, I've qualified for AIME since 6th grade, I've gotten perfect score in AMC 8, and I got distinguished honor roll in AMC 10. Outside of math, I also love programming, chemistry, and physics. Some of my hobbies include playing the piano, reading, and playing video games. I also have some experience of being a tutor. I hope to be able to help all of you learn to love math!

name: Benjamin Zhang
description: Benjamin Zhang is a freshman at Lynbrook high school who loves mathematics, coding, and science. When he's not browsing random AOPS wikis, he also enjoys playing his oboe and spending time with his friends!

name: Niranjan Rao
description: Good afternoon ladies and gentlemen, you have found yourself at my bio. I'm a 2x AIME and 1x USAJMO (I think) qual attending Cupertino High as a freshman, and I enjoy coding and other quirky activities. Now, I can proudly walk away with confidence in the fact that I've hit the 1-5 sentence requirement, right in the middle.

name: Julian Yang
description:
​Westview High School

Julian Yang

I’m a junior at Westivew High School who loves working with math and physics. I qualified for AIME by guessing and USACO silver. Some of my hobbies are playing tennis, the violin, and Brawl Stars. (You can request to 1v1 me) I love working at a collaborative setting as multiple brains are truely bigger than one. I plan on bringing simple yet profound mathematics which will let us see how this subject lets us have greater understand of the world.

name: Sandy Xu
description: Hi! My name is Sandy Xu, and I am currently a junior at Los Altos High School. Some hobbies I have is playing piano and playing flute in marching band. I have some previous experience with competition math and I qualified for AIME in my freshman year. I strongly believe that everyone is capable of excelling and understanding math if given the right guidance and tools, and I wish to help more people see the fun in math.

name: Hanz Baek
description: Hi my name is Hanz Baek, and I'm a freshman at the Harker School. Some of my passions include playing the violin, doing archery, and studying for subjects including math, biology, chemistry, and so much more!

name: Naman Siddheshwar
description: Hi! I am Naman Siddheshwar, a freshman from Basis Independent Silicon Valley, and my favorite subjects are math, physics, computer science, and history. I believe that math is the way to understand the universe. I have participated in AMC 10 and qualified for AIME, and am in USACO Silver. Some of my passions are CS/AI, playing the piano, composing music. I find teaching to be a gratifying and enlightening experience, and I am also teaching piano to students outside of their regular classes.

name: Arnav Agrawal
description: Hi, I'm Aarnav, a sophomore at Monta Vista High School! I attended the COSMOS summer program in Discrete Math and Number Theory, am in USACO Silver, qualified for ACSL finals, and enjoy studying advanced mathematics. I am extremely passionate about CS, math, and debate!

name: Emily Wu
description: I’m Emily Wu, and I am currently a ninth grader at Westview High School. I enjoy math and have been in the math club/math olympiad since like 3rd grade. Right now I’m only taking integrated 3 though. i’ve participated in lots of math competitions before (but never rlly won any lol) and i’d like to help out with teaching some younger students in math.

name: Ishaan Mishra
description: I'm Ishaan Mishra, a freshman at Archbishop Mitty High School who enjoys math and spending time with my family. I have experience in many math competitions such as the AMCs, AIME, etc. I enjoy all fields of math, but I especially enjoy combinatorics and geometry. I also enjoy playing chess, biking, and hiking. I thoroughly enjoy math and eagerly anticipate sharing its wonders with younger students through teaching new concepts

name: Ardell Yu
description: Hi, my name is Ardell Yu, and I am a freshman at LAHS. My main interests are math, art, and writing, and I’m looking forward to working with everyone!

name: Walt Li
description: Hello, I'm Walt, a dedicated math enthusiast with a deep appreciation for the intricacies of numbers, equations, and problem-solving. In addition to my love for mathematics, I find joy and relaxation in playing Maimai, immersing myself in its captivating rhythm and music. These two passions of mine fuel my curiosity and creativity, shaping my journey of learning and exploration in both the mathematical and gaming realms.

name: Illia Hubenko
description: Hey, everybody! I am Illia Hubenko and I am in 9th grade of Technical Lyceum NTU "KPI". Quick about me: a guy from Europe who is interested in math and everything related to it including physics and computer science, sports lover and FPS games enjoyer. Happy to be in Math, for Real✌
